item.title: LD47
Hello World
item.description: New site I’ve had this site for like nearly a year now and I’ve never really made any posts. Infact, I put my generated site into git but not my source, and so I lost it all when I updated my computer. So I guess I’m making it again, this time I swear I’ll save the source in git. Me I’m a software developer with intrests in: lowlevel programming embedded systems machine learning cyber security game development Not web tech A big mix of unrelated things, and it turns out I’m not good at any of them.
